resources.string: Screen lock app for safe usage for kids or to prevent accidental touches.
Touch Lock needs permission to draw over other apps in order to block touch input.
You should switch to the app you want to protect (e.g., YouTube, video call, etc.) before locking the screen.
Touch input is currently disabled. Unlock Touch Lock from the notification to use the app again.
1. The Touch Lock notification is always available in your notification drawer.
2. Open your video, call, or any app you want to protect from accidental touches.
3. Pull down the notification drawer and tap the Touch Lock notification.
4. One tap locks or unlocks instantly - no expansion needed!
Notifications are disabled for Touch Lock. Enable them to lock/unlock from the notification drawer.
The Touch Lock notification channel is blocked. Enable it to lock/unlock from the notification drawer.
